item.title: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018

latestAction.text: Motion to proceed to consideration of measure made in Senate. (consideration: CR S1886-1892, S1892-1931)

item.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

summary.text:
This bill approves the Compact Review Agreement and appendices signed by the United States and the Republic of Palau on September 3, 2010, in connection with the Compact of Free Association with Palau, with the funding schedule therein to be modified by the parties to the agreement as necessary.

Amounts provided to Palau by the United States in FY2011-FY2017 shall be considered as funding to implement the agreement.

The Compact of Free Association Amendments Act of 2003 is amended to extend through FY2024 eligibility for appropriations and grants for specified education assistance and for services under the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.

bill.title: A bill to approve the 2010 Compact Review Agreement with Palau, and for other purposes.

item.title: A bill to approve the 2010 Compact Review Agreement with Palau, and for other purposes.
A bill to approve the 2010 Compact Review Agreement with Palau, and for other purposes.

latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
